DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety profile Teva 's Diclofenac Sodium Gel , 5 % ( test product ) Solaraze® ( diclofenac sodium ) Gel , 3 % ( reference product ) demonstrate clinical equivalence show efficacy 2 active formulation superior vehicle treat subject actinic keratosis ( AK ) face bald scalp .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Parallel-Group , Vehicle-Controlled , Multicenter Study Comparing Diclofenac Sodium Gel , 3 % Solaraze® Gel , 3 % Treatment Actinic Keratosis Face Bald Scalp
